kpi.name: M1010C205

kpi_info.title: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO UE TX POWER FOR RT
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system HHO measurements cancelled due to UE Tx Power for UEs with RT connection. UPDATED: When the RNC receives such a UE Tx Power measurement report from the UE that triggers the cancellation of inter-system HHO measurement.

kpi.kpi_alias: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO UE TX POWER FOR RT
